entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
